That meeting was essentially like a a debriefing of him sitting me down and showing me unreleased death earning footage. It was really me just asking him questions about the game and what and about the scene where the song would live in the game and and he was asking me about how I work. And I think at that stage it was like mid November and I was like, "So, what's the timeline on this?" and he was like, "Well, end of the year."
